dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S287 IS: Marcella LeBeau Recognition Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Rounds (for himself and Mr. Thune) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To designate the Federal building located at 225 South Pierre Street in Pierre, South Dakota, as the “Marcella LeBeau Federal Building”, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Marcella LeBeau Recognition Act.

subsection.text: The Federal building located at 225 South Pierre Street in Pierre, South Dakota, shall be known and designated as the Marcella LeBeau Federal Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the Federal building referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Marcella LeBeau Federal Building.
